text: Anyone know if it's possible to transpose a `violin` plot (from `StatsPlots.jl`)? i.e. I want my violins to go horizontal, not vertical. I feel like I'm just missing a `horizontal=true` option or something.

text: <@U8JP5B9T2> FYI, I was able to get a horizontal violin plot done fairly easily by just copying the violin recipe as a new `violinh` recipe and basically making changes similar to what you had: I just swapped the `x` /`y` values in the series, and changed the `:xaxis` in the call to `Plots.discrete_value!` to a `:yaxis`. Result is exactly what I needed, thanks for your help!

text: Glad to hear it! I think the issue with the recipe I put up was that it didn't play nice with groups (though it's been I while, I may be misremembering). But if it works for your purposes :+1::+1::+1:
